pii_detection.methodology: Pattern-based detection on metadata and content analysis
pii_detection.recommendation: Full PII scan requires text content access. Use spaCy + presidio for comprehensive detection.

pii_scrubbing_recommendations.action: Implement email address detection and redaction
pii_scrubbing_recommendations.rationale: Email addresses are common in code and conversational data

pii_scrubbing_recommendations.action: Implement phone number detection and redaction
pii_scrubbing_recommendations.rationale: Phone numbers may appear in support conversations

pii_scrubbing_recommendations.action: Implement SSN detection for US-focused datasets
pii_scrubbing_recommendations.rationale: SSN patterns may appear in documentation

pii_scrubbing_recommendations.action: Implement API key and secret detection
pii_scrubbing_recommendations.rationale: Code datasets may contain accidentally committed secrets
Automated detection may miss context-dependent risks
